entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
